attributes.additional_details: Facebook need to be held accountable for the lack of policing on their own social networking site.  They ignore our reporting and nothing gets done we would like our government to help us protect our kids that use this site also grieving families that are being attacked by internet trolls.  we want a 24 hour approval system in place for all images and content to stop grieving people being abused in this way. Facebook just aren't listening to us please help us to get heard .thank you
